snippet: To argue that President Obama is not favored to win on Tuesday, a case has to be made for why the polls should not be taken at face value.
abstract: Nate Silver FiveThirtyEight blog contends that Pres Obama is favored to win election according to model--largely because he is ahead in polls of Ohio.
lead_paragraph: To argue that President Obama is not favored to win on Tuesday, a case has to be made for why the polls should not be taken at face value.

headline.seo: The Simple Case for Saying Obama Is the Favorite
headline.main: Simple Case for Saying That Obama Is Favored
headline.print_headline: Simple Case For Saying That Obama Is Favored
